buildCommand: cd .. && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r lib/requirements.txt && python lib/validate.py --schema schema.json --resume resume.yml --template template.jinja && python lib/generate.py --resume resume.yml --template template.jinja --output tex/resume.tex && python lib/compile.py --input tex/resume.tex --output out/Daniel-Wambua-CV.pdf && mkdir -p web/static/downloads && cp out/Daniel-Wambua-CV.pdf web/static/downloads/Daniel-Wambua-CV.pdf && cd web && npm install && npm run build
